name: Clear the Way
summary: You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path.
description:
You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path. You attempt to Shove up to five creatures adjacent to you, rolling a separate Athletics check for each target. Then Stride up to half your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions from any of the creatures you successfully Shoved.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
